text: Fazlul Quader Chaudhury (26 March 1919â€“17 July 1973) was a Bengali politician. He was the 5th speaker of the National Assembly of Pakistan from East Pakistan. He was also the Acting President of Pakistan from 1963 to 1965. ==References== Category:1973 deaths Category:Speakers of the National Assembly of Pakistan Category:1919 births Category:Politicians from Chittagong Division
title: Fazlul Qadir Chaudhry
